title: Smoke It Off!
lyrics:
I said, "Stop, I can't let go"
You really got my soul untold

You really got me down, you really got me down
Stop, I can't let go
You really got my soul untold

You really got me down, you really got me down
(Bye-bye)

Too much, too much, oh, yeah
